            Bio
            I am an Application Specialist at Roche Diagnostics, where I work with customers doing both training and assisting with any issues on their instruments. I have picked up a basis in both Python and R in my free time, and my love for numbers is growing. My goal is to keep learning and see where the numbers take me!
            
            
            Education
            Campbell University | Buies Creek, NC
            Doctorate of Health Sciences | August 2020 - Present
            University of Central Florida | Orlando, FL
            M.S. in Healthcare Informatics | August 2018 - May 2020
            Western Carolina University | Cullowhee, NC
            B.S. in Clinical Laboratory Science | August 2005 - May 2009
            
            
            Experience
            Roche Diagnostics | Field Application Specialist | July 2012 - Present
            Cape Fear Valley Hospital | Medical Laboratory Scientist | June 2009 - July 2012
